First off, welcome to the forums.

A few questions:

  • Is caps lock on? Caps lock toggles a "soft mode" on control, and in that mode it's hard to see the RCS thrust (this one has bit me before).
  • Try turning RCS on and off.
  • Check to see if the RCS thrusters are disabled or if the tanks are locked
  • I don't think I see any additional reaction wheels. Adding some could help, as RCS alone may not be providing enough thrust by itself to cause to rotate the station.
  • Check to make sure there is RCS fuel in the remaining station.

Fuel transferred work like this:

  • R-click + [Mod key*] on one RCS tank
  • R-click + [Mod key*] on the other RCS tank
  • Click in/out to transfer fuel

*The Mod key varies by OS and keyboard. On PCs the mod key is "Alt" by default.

Hope some of that helps.
